CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper January 26, 1957, pg. A15, reads: "Need Volunteers - Urging every women in the city to volunteer three hours of her time to aid in making a TB X-ray visit tot he Lower Hill, Feb. 11 - March 2, are these important figures in the plan. Left to right: Edward A. King, field secretary of the Health and Welfare Federation; Mrs. Lillian C. Staggers, director of the volunteer bureau of the H. and W. F., Donna L. Swain of AKA Sorority, and Edward C. Rusiak of the TB League. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Edward A. King, Lillian C. Staggers, Donna L. Swain, and Edward C. Rusiak of Tuberculosis League of Pittsburgh, gathered to plan x-ray TB screenings in Lower Hill District
